author: markoinether
content: Hey everyone, if you are new to zk tech, we(Chao) have made a separate ZKstudy discord to learn / discuss our dumb or not so dumb questions about zkSync. Basically we are new to ZKtech wanna learn about it, share resources and discuss stuff, rather together than separately, anybody welcome to join! https://discord.gg/ws3z3ptR
